name: WhiteSource
description: Detect security vulnerabilities, problematic open source licenses.
author: WhiteSource

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Root working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory where WhiteSource is run. Defaults to the root of the source working directory. Using [globe-pattern]( https://github.com/isaacs/node-glob).

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A name that uniquely identifies the WhiteSource project to create. Enter a unique name for the new project.

inputs.name: scanReportTimeout
inputs.label: Scan report timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time-out (in minutes) for fetching the scan report
